about_the_game:
Samuda Interval is a visual novel, slice-of-life, murder mystery & supernatural game. You play the daily life of Park Haewon or Park Sae-il, a college freshman attending classes, working part-time jobs, and meeting new people. Solving the serial kidnapping & murder case is your highest priority.

You'll choose certain activities in your daily life that will prepare you for the future. Sometimes you'll need the knowledge to impress a fellow classmate before befriending them, or be charming enough to talk to others. Make sure you take the time to hone your social skills!

The missing persons case happening in Buchan revolving around University of Kilwa-Buchan will be a part of your daily activities as well. Fellow classmate Tenseok Namjoon-hee, better known as "Joonhee," and mysterious figure Miwuda will guide you through the inner workings of the case. With their help, you may be able to stop the murders before they happen.

NOTE: All artwork currently displayed in trailers and screenshots are placeholders. Backgrounds and portraits will be updated as development continues.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Interested in alpha testing (playtesting)? Apply on our website!

content_descriptors.notes: Images containing violence and gore. Mentions of alcohol, suicide, murder, violence. Cursing and crude language.
